it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Deck<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Deck<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - generic type of the deck

    public class Deck<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manages cards of generic types T

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean autoRecycleDiscarded
      Set true if the deck should be recreated with discard List when empty

      List of all elements still in the deck
      private java.util.List<T> discarded
      List of the used element's of the deck

      • Deck

        public Deck(boolean autoRecycleDiscarded,
            java.util.List<T> cards)
        Parameters:
        autoRecycleDiscarded - specifies whether the deck should be reinitialized automatically when it becomes empty, reshuffling the discarded cards
        cards - the initial cards in the deck
